το σωμα:
Rules for Recognition:
The full stem and gender is not easily discernible. It is best to memorize the Nom S, Gen S, and Def Article
When σι is added to the stem, amalgamation will occur
Stems ending in -ντ drop this form when σι is added to the stem
The Gen S of the 3rd Dec is identical to the Nom S of the 2nd Dec
The Neut Nom/Acc forms are identical
Pay attention to the definite articles
